title: Core Paid Media Identifiers
description: Core identifier fields used across all paid media entities and ad networks

xdm:network.title: Network
xdm:network.description: Alias of adNetwork for migration from GenStudio templates

xdm:accountID.title: Account ID
xdm:accountID.description: Unique identifier for the ad account within the network

xdm:accountGUID.title: Account GUID
xdm:accountGUID.description: Unique identifier for the ad account across all networks

xdm:campaignID.title: Campaign ID
xdm:campaignID.description: Unique identifier for the campaign within the network

xdm:campaignGUID.title: Campaign GUID
xdm:campaignGUID.description: Unique identifier for the campaign across all networks

xdm:adGroupID.title: Ad Group ID
xdm:adGroupID.description: Unique identifier for the ad group/ad set/ad squad within the network

xdm:adGroupGUID.title: Ad Group GUID
xdm:adGroupGUID.description: Unique identifier for the ad group/ad set/ad squad across all networks

xdm:adID.title: Ad ID
xdm:adID.description: Unique identifier for the individual ad within the network

xdm:adGUID.title: Ad GUID
xdm:adGUID.description: Unique identifier for the individual ad across all networks

xdm:experienceID.title: Experience ID
xdm:experienceID.description: Unique identifier for creative experience (multi-asset compositions) within the network

xdm:experienceGUID.title: Experience GUID
xdm:experienceGUID.description: Unique identifier for creative experience (multi-asset compositions) across all networks

xdm:assetID.title: Asset ID
xdm:assetID.description: Unique identifier for creative assets (images, videos, etc.) within the network

xdm:assetGUID.title: Asset GUID
xdm:assetGUID.description: Unique identifier for creative assets (images, videos, etc.) across all networks

xdm:portfolioID.title: Portfolio ID
xdm:portfolioID.description: Portfolio identifier for grouping campaigns (Amazon Ads and similar platforms) within the network

xdm:portfolioGUID.title: Portfolio GUID
xdm:portfolioGUID.description: Portfolio identifier for grouping campaigns (Amazon Ads and similar platforms) across all networks

xdm:hierarchyPath.title: Hierarchy Path
xdm:hierarchyPath.description: Full hierarchical path showing parent-child relationships (e.g., account_id/campaign_id/adgroup_id/ad_id)
